thread.title: BRIEF-HKT Trust And HKT ‍says FY Total Revenue HK$33.26 Bln​, Down 2 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-HKT Trust And HKT ‍says FY Total Revenue HK$33.26 Bln​, Down 2 Pct

organizations.name: reuters) - hkt trust and hkt ltd

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Hkt Trust And Hkt Ltd:
* ‍FY TOTAL REVENUE DOWN 2 PERCENT TO HK$33,258 MILLION​ * FY PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO HOLDERS OF SHARE STAPLED UNITS ROSE BY 4 PERCENT TO HK$5,097 MILLION
* ‍FINAL DISTRIBUTION PER SHARE STAPLED UNIT OF 36.75 HK CENTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
